=====================================

## HVAC and Commercial Refrigeration Maintenance

### Contract Opportunities

The Department of Public Works and Government Services is seeking proposals from qualified service providers to deliver HVAC and commercial refrigeration maintenance services at its facilities in the National Capital Region.

#### Project Overview

The intended services include preventative maintenance, inspections, and repairs of HVAC and commercial refrigeration equipment, along with associated tools, materials, and labor. Work is expected to commence on April 1, 2023, and will require periodic inspections and reports.

#### Bid Requirements

*   Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority by February 24, 2023, to confirm their intention to attend a mandatory site visit on March 1, 2023.
*   Only responsive bidders will receive the contract award.

#### Important Dates

| Event    | Date           | Time           |
|----------|----------------|----------------|
| Bid Close| March 21, 2023 | 14:00 (EDT)    |
| Site Visit | March 1, 2023  | 10:00am (EST)  |
| Contract Start | April 1, 2023 |                |

#### Additional Information

*   Security requirements apply to this contract.
*   Services will be provided to the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) located at 1170 Algoma Road, Ottawa, ON.

#### Contact Information

For questions or concerns regarding this RFP, please contact:

Ruest, Stefan (SPAC/PSPC)
